As they near the next phase of their journey through existence, contemplative mentors split their time between unlocking the highest secrets of time and space, and guiding their students and less-talented peers. **[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 43 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 41 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 38 [Contemplative Mentor](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1669) **Source** [Pathfinder #173: Doorway to the Red Star](/Sources.aspx?ID=103) pg. 81 **Perception** +31; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), thoughtsense 100 feet **Languages** [Akitonian](/Languages.aspx?ID=94); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet, [_tongues_](/Spells.aspx?ID=340) **Skills** [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +35, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +32, [Dimension of Time Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +35, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +32, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +31, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +31, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +37, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +33 **Str** -2 **Dex** +6 **Con** +0 **Int** +9 **Wis** +5 **Cha** +6 **Temporal Sense** A contemplative meditant can always roll [Dimension of Time](/Planes.aspx?ID=21) Lore for initiative. When it does, it gains a +2 circumstance bonus to the roll as it acts on flashes of insight harvested from potential futures.
**Thoughtsense** ([divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) The contemplative senses all non-mindless creatures at the listed range --- **AC** 44 **Fort** +24 **Ref** +30 **Will** +33 **HP** 335 **Resistances** [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) 20 **Weaknesses** physical 10 **Atrophied** A contemplative's limbs are withered and incapable of significant physical exertion. A contemplative can't properly wield a two-handed weapon or object without dedicating its telekinetic powers to supporting the weapon, and even then, it takes a –2 penalty to Strikes with such a weapon. It also can't use its spells or fly as long as it wields a two-handed weapon or object. --- **Speed** 5 feet, fly 30 feet **Melee** claw +32 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 3d8+6 slashing plus 4d6 mental **Occult Innate Spells** DC 43, attack +33 - **Cantrips (9th)** [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334) - **7th** [Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180) (×3), [Return to Essence](/Spells.aspx?ID=1087), [Sanctuary](/Spells.aspx?ID=266), [Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=289) - **8th** [Dimensional Anchor](/Spells.aspx?ID=70), [Disappearance](/Spells.aspx?ID=73) (self only), [Discern Location](/Spells.aspx?ID=75) - **9th** [Foresight](/Spells.aspx?ID=127), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180) (×3) - **Constant (9th)** [Tongues](/Spells.aspx?ID=340) **Rituals** - **8th** [Tattoo Whispers](/Rituals.aspx?ID=51) **Project Calm** ([Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) The contemplative mentor projects a field of perfect calm in a 60-foot emanation. All creatures within the area of effect must succeed at a DC 40 Will save or be unable to take [hostile actions](/Rules.aspx?ID=300) for 1 round. After using this ability, the contemplative is [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), or increases its drained value by 1 if it was already drained. A contemplative mentor can't use this ability if its drained value is 3 or more. **Temporal Suppression** ([Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** The contemplative attempts to hinder a target creature's personal flow of time. The target must be within 60 feet, and once targeted must attempt a DC 40 Will save, becoming [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) on a failure or slowed 2 on a critical failure. Each time an affected creature ends its turn, its slowed value decreases by 1. A creature that critically succeeds on their save against Temporal Suppression is temporarily immune to it for 24 hours.
